Package entities

Class SkeletonKing

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.Enemy
entities.SkeletonKing
public class SkeletonKing extends Enemy
Skeleton King is a child-class of Enemy. It is a specific instance of Enemy, that will use the skeleton king constants and implement all behaviors/updates here.
Author:
Sean-Paul Brown

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final int
    ATTACK_FRAME
    This is the frame when the skeleton kings swings its axe, so it is the frame that should be checked for hitting the player

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(int[][] lvlData, Player player)
      This will update where the Skeleton King is, what action they are doing, and their animation.
      Parameters:
      lvlData - - A 2D int array of all of the data in the level
      player - - the Player entity in the Game

    • updateBehavior

      private void updateBehavior(int[][] lvlData, Player player)
      This is a helper function to update the behavior of the Skeleton King based on it's booleans.
      Parameters:
      lvlData - - the current Level's data as a 2D array
      player - - the Player Entity
